    AbstractExchange.getDefaultAffinityMap(List<CoordinationProtos.DrillbitEndpoint> fragmentEndpoints)
    Get a default endpoint affinity map where affinity of a Drillbit is proportional to the number of its occurrences in given endpoint list.
